text: Benjamin Levi Madden (ne Combs; born March 11, 1979) is an American musician. He is the lead guitarist and backing vocalist for the band Good Charlotte. == Early life == Madden was born in Waldorf, Maryland to Robin Madden and Roger Combs. He has an identical twin, Joel Madden with whom he formed the band Good Charlotte. == Personal life == Madden married actress Cameron Diaz in 2015. They have a daughter, Raddix Madden, born through surrogacy in January 2020. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1979 births Category:American Christians Category:American rock guitarists Category:Jewish American musicians Category:Living people
